body_html: @drpngx but the current implementation is not working as it supposed, in the "else" branch, image is converted from float(between 0 to 1) to unsigned int(for example 0 to 255), then dtype.max is 255. The origin code uses dtype.max + 0.5, makes the scale non-uniform.
body_text: @drpngx but the current implementation is not working as it supposed, in the "else" branch, image is converted from float(between 0 to 1) to unsigned int(for example 0 to 255), then dtype.max is 255. The origin code uses dtype.max + 0.5, makes the scale non-uniform.
body: @drpngx but the current implementation is not working as it supposed, in the "else" branch, image is converted from float(between 0 to 1) to unsigned int(for example 0 to 255), then dtype.max is 255. The origin code uses dtype.max + 0.5, makes the scale non-uniform.
